title: Love in Times Square
description: Weddings, vow renewals, surprise proposals, and more in Times Square. Free admission.

title: A Night at the Paris: Valentine’s Day Screenings of Casablanca and Amélie
description: Screenings at The Paris Theater (Midtown). $17 general, $15 seniors/students/people with disabilities.

title: The City Reading Series: 'All Forms of Love' Edition
description: A reading series at P+T Knitwear Bookstore (LES). $5 admission can be applied towards a featured book or any item in the café.

title: Hot + Fresh Burlesque: Valentine’s Edition
description: A burlesque show at House of Yes (Bushwick). $11.50.

title: Planet Yes: Kiss + Tell Sapphic Galentine's Party with Whitney Day
description: A party at The Onyx Room at House of Yes (Bushwick). Free with RSVP.
address: The Onyx Room at House of Yes, Bushwick

title: The Science of Relationships: Hacking Your Love Life with Research
description: A talk at QED (Astoria) exploring the science behind relationships. $8.

title: Sweet Comedy Show: 'Sweet Valentine' Edition
description: A comedy show hosted by Seth Herzog at Chelsea Music Hall. Save 50% with promo code ‘love’.

title: Casablanca in 35mm
description: Screening of Casablanca at Village East by Angelika. $21.

title: Debbie Chou + Friends Sing Breakup Songs
description: A performance at QED (Astoria) featuring breakup songs. $10.

title: Meg Smith's Galentine’s Party
description: A party at C’mon Everybody (Bed-Stuy) celebrating Galentine's Day. $14.84.
